question: The "Limfjord" fjord is located in which country?
explanation: Limfjord Fjord is located in Denmark. It is a shallow part of the sea which has inlets both from the North Sea and Kattegat sea area of the Baltic Sea, separates the North Jutlandic Island from the rest of Jutland Peninsula. Aalborg is the main port of Limfjord fjord. This fjord is famous for its tasty mussels.
